title: Innovation card images on Innovations page

requirements.summary: Show a corresponding image beside the text content for each innovation card with responsive stacking and correct alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the three innovation cards on the Innovations page shows the correct corresponding image next to the innovation text.
The layout is responsive: on smaller screens the image and text stack cleanly without overflow, and on larger screens the image appears beside the text.
Each image includes appropriate alt text matching the innovation title.

file_operations.description: Extend the innovations data to include a per-innovation image src mapped to /assets/Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png, /assets/OSC.png, and /assets/The GPR.jpg, and update the card layout to render an beside the existing title/description (responsive: stacked on small screens, side-by-side on larger screens) with alt text set to the innovation title.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded innovation images as frontend public assets and reference them via /assets/... paths.
acceptanceCriteria: The three uploaded image files are present in the frontend static assets and load successfully in the browser (no broken images).
The Innovations page references the images via /assets/... paths (consistent with existing slider images).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file to the public assets directory so it is available at runtime via /assets/Artifyer The Canvas Experience.png.
Add the uploaded image file to the public assets directory so it is available at runtime via /assets/OSC.png.
Add the uploaded image file to the public assets directory so it is available at runtime via /assets/The GPR.jpg.
